item.description:
Lucia Ristorante ( www.luciaboston.com ) has proven to be one of our favorite dinner spots. So we will have our holiday dinner there on Monday evening, December 14th. It will be served family style. (passed bowls-take all you want) The menu will consist of individual Caprese Salad (bocconcini cheese & tomatoes), followed by family style servings of Penne Pasta in marinara sauce, then Eggplant Parmigiana & Chicken Marsala. American coffee and a mini cannoli will be our dessert. All of the above will cost $45, including tax (7%) and tip. (18%) Alcoholic beverages and soft drinks are extra. Please bring cash, as we expect a large gathering, so individual checks or multiple charges will be difficult and time consuming. We'll have a cocktail hour for mingling from 6:00-7:00, then sit down to dinner at about 7:00. The restaurant is located on the right-hand side of lower Hanover Street, across from the fire station. The dinner will be downstairs on the lower level. Please RSVP by Friday, December 11th at 5:00. It promises to be a wonderful evening among friends.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the bar.
item.name: Lucia-Family Style Holiday Dinner
